name: Blockout!
description:
Find ways to eliminate the blocks. Use explosions to knock the blocks certain while others are safe and sound.

Game Features:

- Simple one touch control: touch the blocks to detonate them.

- Easy and fun to play, but the challenge must complete domination

- Beautiful graphics: a world with beautiful details.

- Enjoy over 30 unique levels conveying different difficulties.

- Do a lot of points to earn stars.

- Unlock level bonus collecting stars.
